resources.string: The phone number is no longer use？

Confirm to clear the group history?
Reminder: The lower positioning frequency, the longer device battery life
Since you choose Power-saving mode, tracking position is limited. If you wanna more tracking in detail, please set other positioning modes (that will short the battery life)
Device uploaded a new photo, please check it in time
Power is less than %s%%, please charge in time
Device has entered power-saving mode and only can answer calls. It can return to normal after charging
Admin agreed to bind request for %s
%s turn on device loss reporting function
%s turn off device loss reporting function
Device successfully unlocked with lost password
Failed to unlock device with lost password
You will not be reminded when receiving messages after turn off
Supporting two types of satellite positioning: American GPS and Russian GLONASS. For outdoor open space, the best positioning accuracy is about 10 meters, but indoor positioning effect is not good.
Device collect surrounding wi–fi hotspot information to calculate its own location information via Wi–Fi modular,. The best positioning accuracy is around 50m。
Device obtains its own position information through network of operators (such as GSM network), and accuracy of positioning is generally around 500m。

A–GPS technology is a technology that combines information of network base station and GPS information to locate mobile station. It can improve performance of GPS satellite positioning system. Through mobile communication operation base station it can quickly locate.The best precision is about 10 meters。
Obtain current movement state of device through auxiliary positioning of acceleration sensor。

Warm tip:\nDuring positioning process, device will intelligently select most appropriate positioning mode according to environment at that time. And tuser does not need to manually select positioning mode
You will not be able to check this device information after unbind.Are you sure to unbind？
For the discount package between SIM cards, you can call each other 2–6 short numbers. \n No need fill if not opened.
Sign in on a new device
Please fill in correct device number. Incorrect number will cause unavailability。
When device number is detected by APP,it will be automatically entered number instead of by manual
What should I do if I need to change my SIM card of device？
Please fill in if you have such package
Want to use data of previous device in new device？
Scan QR code of new device to use data of previous device. The previous device will return to unbind state。
Scan a new watch and use IMEI data
The research shows that insist on fast walking or jogging for 30 minutes every day (more than 110 steps per minute), which is of great health benefits. The daily goal of 8000 steps is recommended
Download with data when not connected to wi–fi, please pay attention to data usage
You need to download TrackMasters APP and bind device to contact with your child
After deleting bind member, bind member is no longer associated with device. Delete？
After unbinding,Local data, photo albums, etc. will be cleared.
Some important data of device will be saved in your APP account.And device will be unbound. Are you sure to unbind everyone and restore factory settings?
Drag contact sorting, and sync to watch after saving
Can answer emergency call of watch
Collection of watch SMS is closed
Child will not be distracted\nwhile studying
Warm reminder \nDuring disabled period,, device only can check time meanwhile restrict all calls and messages.
Start time cannot more than end time.
End time cannot less than start time.
Only contacts in address book can call watch after opening.
If any stranger call, will send message to APP for parents to confirm"
Note: This function will not work when charging.
Watch enters power saving mode when battery is low.
Watch enters power saving mode and only supports answering calls.
Don\'t be afraid of losing\nyour watch
I\'ll help you find a way
After watch is reported lost, it will automatically report location to APP in each boot.
When watch is locked, you can only enter lost password to unlock it.
Unavailable to others, protecting your privacy and property.
After watch is reported lost, volume of messages and ringtones is maximized.
After reporting loss of watch, it will be locked and cannot be used and guarded normally. Are you sure to report loss?
Watch will end report loss function after shutdown. It will not automatically return to position without turning on. Are you sure to close?
Password is too simple, please re-enter.
Note: \n1. If wi–fi does not have a password, you can confirm it directly; \n2. Device does not support it 5G Wi–Fi；
Can\'t make a call after device shutdown
Now watch can only be turned off remotely through APP
Data of any watch or APP will not be deleted after logging out.Are you sure to login out?
Do you want to clear local data such as chat and message record with one click?
The version is updated as follows：\n%s
If you want to turn on or off new message alert for TrackMasters. Please enter mobile phone\"setting\"–\"useage\"，In application list，find\"TrackMasters\"–\"notification\"make changes。
Please enter old password, then enter new password of 6–16 digit combination of letters and numbers
Device uploaded a new photo, please check it in time
Device left electronic safety zone called %s
Device entered electronic safety zone named %s
Power is less than %s%%, please charge in time
Device has entered power-saving mode and only can answer calls. It can return to normal after charging
You need to download TrackMasters APP and bind device to contact with your device
Set for at least one hour
You need to download TrackMasters APP and bind device to contact with your device
Rest heart rate：normal people have 60-100 beats per minute in a quiet state.
Exercise heart rate：judge the body\'s movement state according to the heart rate range, and choose the appropriate heart rate range to achieve better exercise effect.
Trend of heart rate measurement in recent seven times
Click to start measuring heart rate
Turn on continuous measurement function，24-hour detection of your heart rate, heart rate data more detailed, refresh more timely, power consumption will increase by 50%
Dynamically adjust the measurement frequency according to the movement state, and intelligently detect your heart rate 24 hours, which helps to save power
24-hour detection of your heart rate, heart rate data more detailed, refresh more timely, great impact on power consumption
When the heart rate exceeds 150 beats / min for more than 10 minutes in the inactive state
When the heart rate is lower than 45 beats / min for more than 10 minutes in the inactive state
Click to start measuring blood pressure
Normal blood pressure value：\n90MMHG < systolic pressure < 140MMHG\n60MMHG < diastolic pressure < 90MMHG
Trend of blood pressure measurement in recent seven times

The oxygen saturation is the percentage of the volume of oxygenated hemoglobin in the blood to the total binding hemoglobin. It is not only the concentration of oxygen in the blood, but also an important physiological parameter of respiratory cycle\ N\n the oxygen saturation of normal artery is about 96-99%
Trend of blood oxygen saturation measurement in recent seven times

The sleep quality score is based on the Pittsburgh sleep quality index to calculate the basic original value. The sleep quality is evaluated and scored by the factors of sleep regularity, sleep duration, deep sleep proportion, times of waking up at night and waking time measured by the watch.
Body temperature data \n Body temperature data
Trend of body temperature measurement in recent seven times
Sport movement reach medium or high strength, and continue 10mins or above, which will regard as effective sports
Calories and distance are calculated based on height and weight
Power consumption will increase when it is turned on

Please confirm that you have entered phone number not watch number; \nverification code is blocked as spam by security software, and you can find blocked SMS on your phone;\ntry restarting your phone；

Please confirm email format is correct; \nVerification code emails are automatically classified as spam mailbox, which can be found in spammailbox; \n Receiving time is too long, you can open mailbox and click to receive.

1. Insert SIM card into watch and turn it on\n2. Enter binding interface and click icon\n3. There are 10-bit binding code below QR code. If not, it means watch is not connected to network, please check again

Platform renewal refers to the usage period of the platform software, which is not related to the SIM card inside the locator. If the SIM card of the locator device is in arrears, please contact the agent or operator to recharge.

The device manufacturer's charging stand lights up in red first, and then flashes in red and green to indicate that the network signal is being searched.
Then flashes in green to indicate that the network signal has been searched and the latest configuration parameter settings have been downloaded; You will see an update on the configuration data modification time in the configuration information section; Then proceed with charging.
The constant green light indicates full charge.

It is not located when there is power on the charging stand.

Set the scheduled startup time in the configuration information to null. If the device is unplugged from the charging stand or unplugged from the power socket, it will start searching for location.

If the scheduled startup time is set, it should be noted that the device will not work if it is unplugged from the charging stand after the scheduled startup time, You must reset the appointment start time and then grab the latest parameters from the charging stand on the device, and check if the configuration data modification time has changed.

The device needs to be placed on an outdoor pigeon or outside the car to catch the location. If you cannot find the location indoors, it will consume a lot of power and quickly run out of power
